Fixability.ManualSteps:
1. Analise cada issue do linter
2. Corrija manualmente, entendendo o contexto
3. NÃO use golangci-lint run --fix (pode quebrar código)
4. Execute testes após cada correção

Examples: level=error msg="[linters_context] typechecking error: : # github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/internal/handlers [github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/internal/handlers.test]\ninternal\\handlers\\health_test.go:9:7: initialization cycle: contentTypeJSON refers to itself"
internal\events\nats_bus.go:221:46: unused-parameter: parameter 'ctx' seems to be unused, consider removing or renaming it as _ (revive)
internal\events\nats_bus.go:9:2: import 'github.com/nats-io/nats.go' is not allowed from list 'main': Use pkg/natsx facade (depguard)
internal\lifecycle\manager.go:37:10: string `healthy` has 3 occurrences, but such constant `HealthStatusHealthy` already exists (goconst)
